title: FM Bilawal reaffirms to further strengthen Pak-Iran ties
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 24 (APP): Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari on Tuesday reaffirmed Pakistanâ€™s commitment to further strengthen brotherly relations with Iran.
The foreign minister met Iranian counterpart Amir Abdollahian on the sidelines of the 26th Economic Cooperation Organization Council of Ministers (ECO-COM) in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
The two foreign ministers also discussed important global and regional developments.
